name: food
desc: Keep your feline friend happy and healthy with our premium cat food. Made with the finest ingredients to satisfy even the pickiest eaters.

name: can food
desc: Treat your cat to a delicious meal in a convenient can. Packed with nutrients and flavors that will make their taste buds purr in delight.

name: dry food
desc: For cats who prefer a crunchier feast, our dry food is the purr-fect choice. Nutrient-rich and delicious, it'll keep your kitty energized and content.

name: bed
desc: Give your beloved kitty a cozy retreat with our luxurious cat bed. Soft and plush, it's the ultimate spot for catnaps and relaxation.

name: travel bag
desc: Planning a getaway with your furry companion? Our stylish travel bag ensures your cat travels in comfort and style.

name: leash
desc: Take your cat for a stroll with confidence using our durable and comfortable leash. It allows them to explore the outdoors safely.

name: collar
desc: Make your cat the trendsetter of the neighborhood with our fashionable collar. Designed for both style and comfort, it's a must-have accessory.

name: t-shirt
desc: Let your cat strut their stuff in our adorable cat t-shirt. It's not just cute; it also protects their fur during playtime.

name: bath
desc: Make bath time a breeze with our gentle cat shampoo. Your feline companion will emerge from their bath looking and smelling fabulous.

name: litter box
desc: Keep your home clean and odor-free with our spacious litter box. Designed with your cat's comfort and privacy in mind.

name: litter sand
desc: Our premium litter sand clumps tight and neutralizes odors, providing a fresh and hygienic litter box environment.

name: feather toy
desc: Watch your cat's instincts come alive as they chase and pounce on our interactive feather toy. Hours of fun and exercise guaranteed.

name: cat tree
desc: Spoil your adventurous cat with our deluxe cat tree. Climbing, scratching, and lounging - it's an all-in-one paradise for your feline friend.

name: catnip
desc: Treat your cat to a euphoric experience with our high-quality catnip. Sprinkle it on toys or scratchers for endless entertainment.
